participant_1.name: Dexter
participant_1.personality: Introverted and innovative, Dexter often prefers the company of machines over people. He's deeply passionate about technology.
participant_1.background: i'm working on a building a robot to be my body double. i've an allergy to water. i helped design the game starcraft. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am a recluse.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, Lila loves exploring the outdoors and thrives on new experiences.
participant_2.background: i like to go hiking in the spring. i live in colorado. i have a black lab named trooper. i'm a mechanical engineer. my favorite activity is rock climbing.
